lighting.description: Lighting styles and setups for cinematic mood

values.prompt: low-angle warm sunlight, elongated soft-edged shadows, gentle falloff, warm rim separation, slightly lifted blacks, ~4500K white balance
values.video-generation-prompt: A quiet coastal overlook at golden hour. Low-angle warm sunlight paints a couple leaning on a railing as elongated soft-edged shadows trail behind them. Warm rim separation outlines their faces with a honeyed glow, gentle falloff keeps contrast soft, and slightly lifted blacks give a nostalgic warmth. White balance sits around ~4500K as they trade calm smiles and watch waves roll in.

values.prompt: dominant rear key creating strong rim, silhouette-capable ratio, controlled ambient, light haze for beam visibility, restrained flare
values.video-generation-prompt: Inside a dim hangar, a lone figure steps forward as a dominant rear key carves a bright rim around their silhouette. Ambient is tightly controlled; thin haze reveals defined beams that stretch across the floor. The subject pauses in near-silhouette, breathing visible in the light, with restrained flare glinting along the edge of the frame.

values.prompt: large-area diffused source, even luminance, low specularity, compressed contrast, neutral colorimetry, gentle highlight roll-off
values.video-generation-prompt: In a minimalist studio, a dancer practices slow stretches beneath a large-area diffused source. Even luminance flattens harsh transitions, speculars stay low, and contrast remains compressed. Neutral colorimetry keeps tones calm as gentle highlight roll-off caresses skin and fabric during subtle motion.

values.prompt: saturated cyan-magenta signage spill, localized colored pools, subtle atmospheric bloom, mixed CCT sources, crisp specular micro-contrast
values.video-generation-prompt: A rain-slicked alley glows with saturated cyan‑magenta signage. Localized colored pools light passing pedestrians while subtle atmospheric bloom softens bright edges. Mixed CCT storefronts flicker as crisp specular micro-contrast sparks on wet asphalt and chrome scooter mirrors.

values.prompt: directional solar key, sky dome bounce, defined penumbra, neutral white balance, realistic contrast without artificial fill
values.video-generation-prompt: On a cliffside trail, a hiker pauses under clear skies. A directional solar key casts defined penumbra across rocky ground as sky dome bounce gently lifts shadows. White balance stays neutral and contrast feels realistic with no artificial fill—just sun, wind, and ocean spray.

values.prompt: broad field of view prioritizing spatial scale, small frame occupancy for focal element, layered foreground-midground-background
values.video-generation-prompt: From a ridge at dawn, the camera holds a broad field of view over a valley. A small lone hiker occupies minimal frame space while layered foreground rocks, sweeping midground meadows, and distant mountains establish grand scale and depth.

values.prompt: tight frame on a single detail, shallow depth of field, low background information, high texture emphasis in focus plane
values.video-generation-prompt: A tight frame isolates a calligrapher’s pen tip kissing paper. Shallow depth of field blurs the studio into soft haze while the focus plane reveals fibers of the paper and ink texture. Tiny hand tremors animate the moment.

values.prompt: balanced framing with moderate subject size, contextual background retention, comfortable headroom and lead room
values.video-generation-prompt: In a cozy cafe, a barista stands framed waist-up behind the counter. Steam curls up from a pitcher as shelves and patrons linger softly in the background. Headroom and lead room feel natural, keeping gesture and context balanced.

values.prompt: top-down high vantage, visible ground geometry and patterns, clear parallax lines, layout-revealing composition
values.video-generation-prompt: A top-down drone view glides slowly over terraced fields. Ground geometry and irrigation lines form rhythmic patterns as parallax shifts reveal the layout, farmers moving like markers across the grid.

values.prompt: camera below focal horizon, upward tilt emphasizing verticals, mild perspective exaggeration, increased perceived scale
values.video-generation-prompt: At the base of a modern tower, the camera tilts up from below the horizon, exaggerating verticals. The subject stands near the facade, appearing larger-than-life as clouds sweep past the building’s soaring edges.

values.prompt: leftward horizontal pivot on nodal point, constant angular speed, shutter-matched motion blur, horizon stability
values.video-generation-prompt: Inside a gallery, the camera pivots left on a nodal point with constant angular speed. Paintings glide into frame one by one as shutter-matched blur keeps motion smooth and the horizon rock-solid.

values.prompt: rightward horizontal pivot on nodal point, constant angular speed, shutter-matched motion blur, horizon stability
values.video-generation-prompt: On a rooftop at dusk, the camera pans right at a steady rate. City lights reveal themselves in sequence, horizon held steady, with gentle motion blur smoothing the sweep across the skyline.

values.prompt: linear forward translation, stabilized path, increasing foreground parallax, smooth ease in/out
values.video-generation-prompt: A forest path invites a linear forward glide. Stabilized movement increases foreground parallax as ferns and trunks slide by. The motion eases in and out, guiding the eye toward a sunlit clearing.

values.prompt: optical-style focal length reduction toward tighter FOV, centered framing retention, gentle acceleration, exposure compensation
values.video-generation-prompt: Across a bustling plaza, the camera performs an optical-style zoom toward a violinist, tightening FOV while keeping them centered. Gentle acceleration and exposure compensation maintain balance as background compresses.

values.prompt: locked-off support emulation, zero drift, no micro jitter, only intra-frame elements exhibit motion
values.video-generation-prompt: A locked-off frame watches a misty lake at sunrise. There is zero drift or jitter; only water ripples and slow fog movement animate the scene as distant birds cross the sky.

values.prompt: low contrast base, gentle luminance transitions, slow temporal cadence, absence of abrupt intensity shifts, harmonious color relationship
values.video-generation-prompt: A quiet riverside at dawn. Low contrast and gentle luminance transitions lull the eye as reeds and water move slowly. Colors harmonize softly with no abrupt changes, inviting deep, unhurried breaths.

values.prompt: soft highlight glow, faint particulate presence, cool-warm interplay, elongated light decay, floating temporal feel
values.video-generation-prompt: A pine grove swaddled in morning mist. Soft highlight glow clings to leaves, faint particles drift through cool-warm shafts, and elongated light decay makes the moment feel suspended in time.

values.prompt: elevated contrast, deep shadow mass, rapid intensity modulation, bold chroma accents, pronounced texture clarity
values.video-generation-prompt: A storm-battered pier in night rain. Elevated contrast and deep shadow masses frame bold chroma accents from warning lights as textures snap into clarity with each surge of intensity.

values.prompt: amber-biased tones, subtle halation, fine-grain texture, soft vignette, lifted shadow floor
values.video-generation-prompt: A sunlit living room in late afternoon. Amber-biased tones glow across family photos, subtle halation halos lamps, and fine grain hums under a soft vignette. Shadows lift gently as dust dances in the light.

values.prompt: suppressed midtones, strong black point, selective illumination zones, desaturated palette bias
values.video-generation-prompt: A sparsely lit workshop at midnight. Midtones are suppressed and black points run deep. Only slivers of light reveal tools and hands, while a desaturated palette keeps the mood taut and private.

values.prompt: physically plausible shading and GI, filmic response curve, restrained saturation, subtle lens artifacts, organic fine grain
values.video-generation-prompt: A bustling street vendor scene. Physically plausible shading and GI ground materials in reality, a filmic curve shapes highlights and shadows, restrained saturation and subtle lens artifacts mingle with organic fine grain.

values.prompt: reduced micro-contrast, lifted blacks, diffused highlight bloom, pastel-leaning accents, softened edges
values.video-generation-prompt: A couple meanders through a flower field. Reduced micro-contrast and lifted blacks embrace diffused highlight bloom, pastel accents, and softened edges that trail their movement like a sigh.

values.prompt: compressed midtones, deep blacks, bright speculars, saturated key hues, crisp edge definition
values.video-generation-prompt: A night under an overpass. Compressed midtones and deep blacks anchor the frame while bright speculars pop off wet concrete. Saturated key hues slice through with crisp edge definition.

values.prompt: fine grain, soft halation, mild gate weave, warm-muted palette, gentle shoulder in highlights
values.video-generation-prompt: A 70s kitchen glows with warm-muted colors. Fine grain and soft halation ring around lamps, a mild gate weave breathes into the frame, and a gentle highlight shoulder keeps the light tender.

values.prompt: natural joint articulation, facial micro-movements enabled, clothing physics with gravity and airflow response, anatomically plausible proportions
values.video-generation-prompt: At a trailhead, a traveler tightens their pack straps. Natural joint articulation and facial micro-movements read focus, while clothing responds to gravity and a light breeze. Proportions remain grounded as they step forward.

values.prompt: species-appropriate locomotion, secondary dynamics on appendages, anisotropic fur/feather shading, mass-aware motion
values.video-generation-prompt: A fox edges along a forest boundary. Species-appropriate gait keeps paws deliberate, ears flick with secondary motion, and anisotropic fur catches streaks of light as its mass anchors each step.

values.prompt: mass-aware suspension behavior, rotational blur on wheels, reflective bodywork shading, emissive light materials
values.video-generation-prompt: A sports coupe idles at a stoplight. Suspension breathes with engine vibration, wheels show rotational blur on roll-off, reflective paint mirrors city colors, and emissive tail-lights glow cleanly.

values.prompt: no hero subject, spatial depth emphasis, ambient motion sources only, architectural or natural forms prioritized
values.video-generation-prompt: A foggy canyon exhales at sunrise—no hero subject. Spatial depth dominates as mist drifts, trees sway, and cliffs layer into the distance. Nature’s architecture takes center stage.

values.prompt: clean silhouette, controlled speculars, rotation-friendly readability, neutral interference from surroundings
values.video-generation-prompt: A matte-black smartwatch rotates on a pedestal. A clean silhouette and controlled speculars trace the edges while neutral surroundings avoid distraction, preserving crisp readability at every angle.

values.prompt: roadway and sidewalk structure, signage presence, storefront modules, pavement material variety, layered architectural depth
values.video-generation-prompt: A lively avenue pulses with signage and storefront modules. Roadway and sidewalk structure guide foot traffic over mixed pavement materials, while layered architecture stacks depth into the frame.

values.prompt: terrain variation, vegetation distribution, geological features, atmospheric perspective gradients, horizon clarity
values.video-generation-prompt: Rolling hills unfold with varied terrain and scattered trees. Geological outcrops punctuate the slope as atmospheric perspective fades distant ridges beneath a crisp horizon.

values.prompt: enclosed volume definition, practical light sources, coherent material set, furniture layout cues, scale readability
values.video-generation-prompt: A studio apartment shows its enclosed volume by practical lamps and a cohesive material palette—matte walls, warm wood floors, soft textiles. Furniture layout reads clearly to define scale.

values.prompt: vertical stratification, luminous interface elements, advanced transit markers, sleek materials, volumetric light shafts
values.video-generation-prompt: A vertical city layers platforms and skybridges. Luminous interfaces pulse along walkways, advanced transit beacons guide drones, and sleek materials shimmer in volumetric light shafts.

values.prompt: metal frameworks, conduit networks, surface wear and patina, utility lighting, repeating structural patterns
values.video-generation-prompt: Inside a steelworks, metal frameworks and conduit networks crisscross overhead. Utility lights buzz over worn surfaces with patina, repeating beams forming a rhythmic grid in depth.

time_of_day.description: Temporal context affecting light and mood

values.prompt: cool-to-warm sky gradient, low-angle soft luminance, modest ambient level, shallow atmospheric veil
values.video-generation-prompt: A lakeshore breathes under a cool-to-warm sky gradient. Low-angle soft light grazes reeds, ambient stays modest, and a shallow atmospheric veil softens distant trees.

values.prompt: high solar altitude, short hard-edged shadows, high scene illumination, neutral color rendition
values.video-generation-prompt: A street market bustles beneath high sun. Short, hard-edged shadows define space, illumination peaks, and colors render neutral as people weave between stalls.

values.prompt: low sun elevation, warm spectral bias, long soft-edged shadows, enhanced highlight separation
values.video-generation-prompt: A vineyard glows with low sun elevation. Warm spectral bias kisses leaves, long soft-edged shadows stretch across rows, and enhanced highlight separation reveals texture.

values.prompt: cool ambient dominance, reduced global contrast, balanced sky-ground luminance, cyan cast stability
values.video-generation-prompt: A marina settles into blue hour. Cool ambient dominates as global contrast drops; sky and ground luminance balance gently while boats nod under a steady cyan cast.

values.prompt: low ambient baseline, artificial source dependence, deep shadow pockets, noise-controlled exposure
values.video-generation-prompt: An alleyway rests in deep shadow pockets. With ambient low, artificial lights carve islands of color. Exposure stays clean and controlled as a sign hums above damp brick.

values.prompt: unobstructed visibility, minimal scatter, crisp edge definition, pronounced shadows
values.video-generation-prompt: On a mountain ridge, visibility is crystal. Minimal scatter sharpens edges while pronounced shadows etch rock faces as a hiker takes in the vast view.

values.prompt: uniform sky luminance, suppressed shadows, muted chroma, flattened contrast
values.video-generation-prompt: A city park under uniform gray sky. Shadows are suppressed, chroma muted, and contrast flattened, making gestures and forms read more than highlights.

values.prompt: falling streaks, wet-surface reflections, micro-ripples and splashes, elevated specular activity
values.video-generation-prompt: A diner frontage gleams in a downpour. Rain streaks slice through neon, wet asphalt mirrors signage, and micro-ripples and splashes sparkle with elevated speculars.

values.prompt: volumetric scattering layer, depth desaturation, softened silhouettes, visible light beams
values.video-generation-prompt: A bridge dissolves into dense fog. Volumetric scatter desaturates depth as silhouettes soften, and headlamps cast visible beams through the milk-white air.

values.prompt: aerial flakes, soft accumulation, cooler white balance bias, dampened scene contrast
values.video-generation-prompt: A town square hushes under falling snow. Aerial flakes drift down, soft accumulation mounds on benches, a cooler white balance biases the scene, and contrast dampens to calm.

values.prompt: log-to-film tone map, gentle shoulder and toe, natural neutrals, restrained saturation
values.video-generation-prompt: A seaside cafe sequence maps log to film with a gentle shoulder and toe. Neutrals remain natural, saturation restrained, and highlights breathe smoothly across glass and chrome.

values.prompt: cyan-biased shadows, warm-biased highlights, preserved neutrals, boosted contrast
values.video-generation-prompt: A rooftop meet-up at dusk grades with cyan‑biased shadows and warm highlights. Neutrals hold steady while boosted contrast sculpts faces against the skyline.

values.prompt: low saturation, blue-tinted grayscale, luminance-driven separation, stable cool cast
values.video-generation-prompt: A rainy boulevard plays in blue‑tinted grayscale. Low saturation lets luminance do the work, maintaining a stable cool cast as umbrellas drift by.

values.prompt: browns and olive greens emphasis, soft midtone contrast, organic texture priority
values.video-generation-prompt: A craftsman’s studio leans into browns and olive greens. Soft midtone contrast favors organic textures—wood grain, canvas weave, and soil-stained tools.

values.prompt: high-chroma magenta-cyan-violet accents, pronounced bloom on brights, deep clean blacks
values.video-generation-prompt: A club entrance thrums with magenta‑cyan‑violet accents. Brights bloom with intention over deep, clean blacks as guests flow past velvet ropes.

values.prompt: primary focus on thirds intersections, balanced negative space, guided gaze hierarchy
values.video-generation-prompt: On a cliff edge, the subject stands at a thirds intersection. Balanced negative space extends to sea and sky as the gaze follows a clear hierarchy from foreground grasses to horizon.

values.prompt: axial center balance, mirrored elements, minimal tilt, symmetry integrity
values.video-generation-prompt: A grand hall presents perfect axial balance. Mirrored columns and floor patterns align dead center, minimal tilt preserving symmetry as a figure walks straight down the axis.

values.prompt: converging line guidance, visible vanishing points, layered depth along line paths
values.video-generation-prompt: Rail tracks converge on a visible vanishing point. A distant figure approaches along the line, layered depth unfolding in sleepers, gravel, and skyline.

values.prompt: edge occluders for depth, parallax layers, frame-within-frame emphasis
values.video-generation-prompt: Through a broken archway, a city square appears. Edge occluders build parallax layers, creating a frame‑within‑frame that reveals life beyond the threshold.

values.prompt: expanded unoccupied areas, silhouette clarity, minimal detail clutter
values.video-generation-prompt: A lone tree against a vast sky. Expanded negative space clears clutter, and the silhouette reads crisp and contemplative against open air.

values.prompt: approx 24–28mm FOV, expanded perspective, mild barrel distortion, spatial exaggeration
values.video-generation-prompt: A narrow alley stretches with a 24–28mm feel. Expanded perspective and mild barrel distortion exaggerate space as the subject strides toward camera between high walls.

values.prompt: approx 35–50mm FOV, natural perspective, balanced background compression
values.video-generation-prompt: A street portrait at ~40mm frames the subject naturally. Background compression stays balanced, letting the city breathe without overwhelming their presence.

values.prompt: approx 85–135mm FOV, strong compression, shallow depth separation, reduced distortion
values.video-generation-prompt: Across a boulevard, an 85–135mm look compresses distance. Shallow depth isolates a cyclist as traffic melts into soft, creamy shapes behind.

values.prompt: extreme close focus, high reproduction ratio, pronounced bokeh, micro-texture resolution
values.video-generation-prompt: Dew beads on a leaf at dawn. Extreme close focus resolves micro-texture as pronounced bokeh turns the garden into abstract watercolor behind the droplets.

values.prompt: cinemascope stretch feel, oval bokeh, horizontal flares, gentle edge softness
values.video-generation-prompt: A night drive unfurls in cinemascope. Streetlights bloom into oval bokeh, horizontal flares streak across the frame, and gentle edge softness adds character.

values.prompt: approx 180-degree shutter feel, natural blur trails, smooth temporal cadence
values.video-generation-prompt: A runner glides along a boardwalk with a ~180° shutter feel. Natural blur trails and smooth cadence render motion cinematic as waves roll behind.

values.prompt: short effective shutter, minimal blur, staccato temporal response
values.video-generation-prompt: A parkour leap sequence plays with a short effective shutter. Minimal blur gives a staccato snap to limbs and edges as the athlete clears a gap.

values.prompt: long effective shutter, extended trail length, creamy motion transitions
values.video-generation-prompt: A twilight dance uses a long effective shutter. Extended trails smear spins into luminous ribbons, blending steps into creamy transitions.

sound_direction.description: Optional guidance for post sound/music (non-visual; metadata only)

values.prompt: broadband environmental bed, low dynamic range, spatial continuity without rhythmic emphasis
values.video-generation-prompt: A library reading room breathes with page turns, distant footsteps, and HVAC hush. Low dynamic range preserves spatial continuity without rhythmic emphasis.

values.prompt: high dynamic range cues, percussive transients at visual beats, rising tension arcs
values.video-generation-prompt: A heist prep montage climbs in tension. High dynamic range cues, percussive hits on visual beats, and a relentless rise propel the sequence.

values.prompt: band-limited tonal layer, gentle tape hiss, soft transients with warm timbre
values.video-generation-prompt: A home video memory floats on a band-limited bed. Gentle tape hiss and warm, soft transients frame the scene with cozy imperfection.

values.prompt: thin uniform volumetric layer, enhanced beam visibility, mild contrast reduction, depth softening
values.video-generation-prompt: A rehearsal stage glows through thin, uniform haze. Beams from backlights cut cleanly, contrast dips mildly, and depth softens around performers.

values.prompt: small floating particulates, depth layering, slow random drift, visibility in strong light cones
values.video-generation-prompt: Sunbeams through a barn window reveal drifting motes. Small particulates layer in depth, moving in slow, random paths where light cones are strongest.

values.prompt: ground impact ripples, surface micro-splashes, window streak artifacts, specular glints
values.video-generation-prompt: An overhead plaza view shows raindrops bursting into ripples. Micro-splashes flicker on stone, window streaks crawl down glass, and specular glints skate across puddles.

values.prompt: short-lived bright particles with decay, ballistic trajectories, gravity and drag aware
values.video-generation-prompt: A welder grinds a beam, throwing bright, short-lived sparks. Particles follow ballistic arcs, fade with decay, and react believably to gravity and drag.

values.prompt: soft highlight expansion, glow fringe around brights, controlled intensity to avoid clipping
values.video-generation-prompt: A lantern-lit festival night blooms with soft highlight expansion. Glow fringes halo bright lanterns with controlled intensity that preserves detail.

action_blocking.description: Subject actions and timing (subject-agnostic phrasing only)

values.prompt: minimal pose variance, micro-movements only, extended temporal holds, ambient motion prominence
values.video-generation-prompt: A lighthouse interior holds in stillness. Only micro-movements—breathing, fabric shift, a candle flicker—play, while ocean ambience carries the moment.

values.prompt: periodic locomotion loop, consistent stride timing, subtle secondary oscillations, steady forward progression
values.video-generation-prompt: A commuter walks along a platform in a smooth loop. Stride timing stays consistent, hips and shoulders show subtle oscillation, and forward progression remains steady.

values.prompt: transition from low-illumination zone to higher exposure, brief silhouette hold, gradual detail roll-in
values.video-generation-prompt: From a shadowed doorway, the subject steps into brighter light. A brief silhouette hold precedes gradual detail roll-in across features and clothing.

values.prompt: slow orbital path around focal item, incremental perspective shifts, timed pauses for feature clarity
values.video-generation-prompt: A prototype sits on a pedestal as the camera orbits slowly. Perspective shifts incrementally, pausing at intervals to showcase distinct design features.

values.prompt: initial occlusion with progressive clearance, widening view, deliberate pacing to register scale
values.video-generation-prompt: Rocks fill the frame, then glide aside to unveil a canyon. The view widens deliberately, giving time to register scale and depth.

values.prompt: path-following movement across layered spaces, intermittent brief stops, tempo aligned to spatial rhythm
values.video-generation-prompt: A courier weaves through layered streets, following sinuous paths. Brief stops punctuate turns, the tempo syncing with the city’s spatial rhythm.

values.prompt: sequence of short-duration inserts, match-on-action continuity, rhythmic temporal spacing
values.video-generation-prompt: Hands measure, cut, sand, and polish in rapid inserts. Match-on-action ties shots together with rhythmic spacing that builds momentum.

values.prompt: accelerated forward motion followed by brief backward orientation shift, momentum-preserving trajectory
values.video-generation-prompt: The camera surges forward down a corridor, then snaps to a brief over-shoulder check. Momentum resumes instantly along the original vector.

values.prompt: exit geometry aligned with entry geometry, motion direction preserved, minimal visual discontinuity
values.video-generation-prompt: A circular clock face fills the exit frame, cutting to a circular fountain aligned in size and position. Motion direction persists, minimizing any visual jolt.

values.prompt: high-speed lateral blur at beat point, directional continuity, brief motion masking window
values.video-generation-prompt: At a musical beat, a high-speed lateral blur whips the frame. Directional continuity bridges to the next scene, using the blur as a motion mask.

values.prompt: luminance dip to near-black, eased fade curves, clear separation of beats
values.video-generation-prompt: The image eases down into near-black, holds for a breath, then rises into the next scene with smooth curves and clearly separated beats.

values.prompt: foreground occluder wipes frame, next composition appears along same direction, spatial flow continuity
values.video-generation-prompt: A passing bus wipes across the frame, revealing a new location in the same direction of travel, preserving spatial momentum and flow.

values.prompt: photoreal shading and GI cues, camera artifact realism, physical material responses, grounded motion physics
values.video-generation-prompt: A corner cafe vignette plays with photoreal shading and GI. Subtle camera artifacts and physically reactive materials keep motion grounded in reality.

values.prompt: cel-shaded tonal steps, clean contour lines, limited gradients, stylized smear frames for motion
values.video-generation-prompt: On a rooftop, two rivals face off in cel-shaded steps. Clean contours, minimal gradients, and stylized smear frames punctuate fast strikes and leaps.

values.prompt: non-photoreal proportions, simplified textures, soft SSS where applicable, painterly shading hints
values.video-generation-prompt: A whimsical kitchen bustles with chubby proportions and simplified textures. Soft SSS and painterly shading lend warmth to every utensil and pastry.

values.prompt: sketched outlines, watercolor or pencil fills, subtle frame-to-frame boil, reduced palette
values.video-generation-prompt: A town square animates with sketched lines and watercolor fills. A gentle frame-to-frame boil and reduced palette create charming motion.

values.prompt: ink-heavy chiaroscuro, halftone or crosshatch shading, high black-white contrast, minimal gradients
values.video-generation-prompt: An alley confrontation renders in heavy ink and chiaroscuro. Halftone shadows and stark black‑white contrast keep gradients at bay for punchy drama.

values.prompt: stepped temporal cadence, tactile surface imperfections, subtle frame jitter, handcrafted impression
values.video-generation-prompt: A tiny workshop whirs with tactile imperfections. Stepped cadence, slight frame jitter, and handmade textures evoke stop-motion charm.

values.prompt: low-resolution grid aesthetic, limited palette ramps, dither shading, discrete step motion
values.video-generation-prompt: A side-scrolling cityscape lights up in a low-res grid. Limited ramps, dithered shadows, and discrete step motion sell the pixel aesthetic.

values.prompt: flat vector forms, geometric layouts, smooth easing, restrained color blocking, typography-safe spacing
values.video-generation-prompt: Geometric shapes animate on a flat canvas with smooth easing. Restrained color blocks and generous type-safe spacing keep information clean.

motion_logic.description: High-level rules for how motion should behave and escalate

values.prompt: initial low velocity, gradual amplitude increase, extended early holds, late acceleration
values.video-generation-prompt: A storm forms on the horizon. Movement begins almost still, holds linger, then amplitude grows, culminating in a late accelerating surge of clouds.

values.prompt: steady baseline with periodic speed spikes, rapid return to base tempo, beat-synced dynamics
values.video-generation-prompt: A production line hums with a steady pace. At intervals, speed spikes punctuate tasks, snapping back to baseline in time with rhythmic beats.

values.prompt: uniform velocity profile, no abrupt changes, bezier-smooth transitions, persistent directionality
values.video-generation-prompt: A drone crosses farmland at uniform speed. No abrupt changes—only bezier-smooth turns and persistent direction as patterns unroll below.

values.prompt: alternation between still holds and swift moves, high speed delta at markers, crisp temporal punctuation
values.video-generation-prompt: A surveillance cam alternates between frozen holds and sudden pans. Each move lands with a high speed delta, hitting crisp temporal marks.

values.prompt: paths maximizing depth differential, layered occlusion choreography, contrasting foreground/background drift
values.video-generation-prompt: A forest walk threads routes that maximize depth. Foreground trunks occlude and reveal midground ferns and distant path lines for strong parallax play.

focus_control.description: Focus behavior and depth of field intent

values.prompt: narrow depth of field, strong background blur, critical sharp plane maintained, soft bokeh highlights
values.video-generation-prompt: A musician tunes a guitar under soft light. Eyes stay in a narrow sharp plane as the background melts into soft bokeh orbs, isolating the moment.

values.prompt: broad depth of field from near to far, minimized blur, high spatial readability
values.video-generation-prompt: A rooftop garden and city skyline both read clearly. Broad depth of field minimizes blur, preserving near planters and distant towers in crisp relief.

values.prompt: timed focal plane shifts between set distances, smooth breathing emulation, eased transitions
values.video-generation-prompt: In a studio nook, focus shifts from a foreground plant to an artist sketching behind it. Transitions ease with smooth breathing that guides attention.

values.prompt: continuous lock on designated focal plane, anticipatory adjustments, stable sharpness maintenance
values.video-generation-prompt: A jogger runs toward camera as AF holds tight. Anticipatory adjustments keep sharpness stable through distance changes and direction shifts.

historical_period.description: Era-specific visual, architecture and material cues (subject-agnostic)

values.prompt: stone and metal artifacts, hand-crafted surface irregularities, limited glazing, weathered patinas, pre-industrial tool forms
values.video-generation-prompt: An open-air stone courtyard displays metal artifacts. Hand-crafted irregularities and weathered patinas define surfaces; pre-industrial tools rest under diffuse light.

values.prompt: timber-and-stone construction, low-intensity practical illumination, coarse natural materials, pre-modern construction logic
values.video-generation-prompt: A timber-and-stone hall glows by firelight. Coarse materials and pre-modern construction logic shape the space, flicker spilling across rough-hewn beams.

values.prompt: classical architectural motifs, rich surface finishes, decorative craftsmanship, early scientific instruments
values.video-generation-prompt: A studio with classical motifs and rich finishes. Decorative craftsmanship frames shelves of early instruments, dust motes drifting in a slant of light.

values.prompt: ornate ironwork, gaslight-era fixtures, dark wood interiors, early mechanized elements, layered decor schemes
values.video-generation-prompt: A parlor lined with dark wood and ornate iron. Gaslight-era fixtures flicker as early mechanized accents and layered decor accumulate lived-in detail.

values.prompt: art deco geometry, polished metals, early automotive markers, geometric ornamentation, smoky ambiance potential
values.video-generation-prompt: An art deco lobby gleams with polished metal and geometric patterns. Early automotive cues arrive outside, smoke curling through shafts of light.

values.prompt: mid-century modern forms, bold patterns, analog signage, period electronics housings, saturated accent hues
values.video-generation-prompt: A mid-century living room pops with bold textiles and analog signage. Period electronics hum softly as saturated accents brighten clean lines.

values.prompt: neon-forward signage, chunky plastics, graphic motifs, saturated palette choices, retro tech silhouettes
values.video-generation-prompt: A neon-drenched arcade hums with chunky plastics and graphic motifs. Saturated palettes and retro tech silhouettes define the vibe.

values.prompt: minimal luminous interfaces, clean energy indicators, lightweight composites, efficient spatial layouts
values.video-generation-prompt: A transit hub glows with minimal luminous interfaces. Clean energy indicators pulse along lightweight composite surfaces in efficient layouts.

values.prompt: advanced non-terrestrial materials, abstract structural logic, autonomous system cues, unconventional lighting schemes

culture_context.description: Region/culture-inspired motifs, materials, patterns, palette and objects (purely cultural; scene-agnostic)

values.prompt: minimalist material palette, shoji-like translucency, tatami-inspired textures, restrained neutrals with seasonal accent hues, kanji/katakana typographic motifs
values.video-generation-prompt: A tea room breathes in minimalist textures. Shoji-like translucency and tatami patterns meet restrained neutrals with delicate seasonal accents and kanji motifs.

values.prompt: stucco and limestone textures, terracotta and ceramic accents, airy pastel palette, natural wood and wicker details, coastal color influence
values.video-generation-prompt: A sunlit courtyard pairs stucco and limestone with terracotta pots. An airy pastel palette and wicker details carry a gentle coastal influence.

values.prompt: geometric surface patterns, mashrabiya-like lattice motifs, warm neutral stones, teal and ochre tile cues, lantern-style luminaire shapes
values.video-generation-prompt: A shaded patio layers geometric tiles and mashrabiya lattice. Warm neutral stone frames teal‑ochre accents as lantern-shaped luminaires glow softly.

values.prompt: light-toned woods, clean-lined forms, muted cool palette, soft textiles, functional minimal ornament, hygge-style warmth cues
values.video-generation-prompt: A bright apartment mixes light-toned wood and clean lines. A muted cool palette and soft textiles add hygge warmth with minimal ornament.

values.prompt: vivid chroma accents, mural-style graphics, patterned tiles, tropical greenery motifs, handcrafted texture presence
values.video-generation-prompt: A lively plaza thrives with mural graphics and patterned tiles. Vivid chroma splashes among tropical greenery and handcrafted textures.

values.prompt: earth-tone base with saturated accent blocks, bold contemporary textile patterns, carved wood textures, beadwork and woven motifs
values.video-generation-prompt: A gallery installation grounds earth tones with saturated accent blocks. Bold textiles, carved woods, and beadwork weave cultural richness.

values.prompt: jewel-tone accents, jaali-like perforation patterns, ornate carvings, polished brass/copper cues, marigold and turmeric palette hints
values.video-generation-prompt: A courtyard wedding shimmers with jewel tones. Jaali perforations and ornate carvings frame polished brass as marigold hues bloom.

values.prompt: pastel facade hues, folk pattern motifs, practical material finishes, Cyrillic/Latin signage cues, modest ornamentation
values.video-generation-prompt: A quiet street of pastel facades carries folk motifs and practical finishes. Cyrillic signage and modest ornament lend a grounded charm.

values.prompt: mixed-material palette with brick and glass, bold sans-serif typographic cues, diner-sign aesthetics, sports and utility object motifs
values.video-generation-prompt: A downtown block blends brick and glass beneath bold sans-serif signs. Diner-style neon and utility motifs sketch an iconic urban feel.

values.prompt: kilim and geometric textile patterns, blue-and-white ceramic tile cues, copper and glassware motifs, warm neutral palette with spice-tone accents
values.video-generation-prompt: A cafe terrace layers kilim textiles over blue‑white tiles. Copper and glassware glint as warm neutrals mix with spice-tone accents.
